title: Economic Dispatch of Generators
description: The energy management system (EMS) needs to create a dispatch schedule for the utility's power plants for the next hour that meets the load at the lowest possible cost.

tasks.description: Get the system load forecast for the next hour.
tasks.expected_outcome: System has the target MW to be generated.

tasks.description: Retrieve the bid prices and operating limits for all available power plants.
tasks.expected_outcome: System compiles the cost and capacity for each generator.

tasks.description: Run an economic dispatch algorithm to determine the optimal output level for each plant.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a dispatch schedule that stacks the generators from cheapest to most expensive.

tasks.description: Send the dispatch setpoints to each power plant's control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: System sends the MW targets to the generators.
